credit_line: Gift of Mrs. R. Curt Hasenclever
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 150 x 73.5 cm (59 1/16 x 28 15/16 in.)
Repeat H: 74.9 cm (29 1/2 in.)
title: Textile
medium:
Medium: silk, cotton, metallic yarns
Technique: supplementary warp pile (velvet). Pattern formed by continuous supplementary wefts whose long floats on the  front are bound to form "filling" patterns.
description: Woven design intended to look like Renaissance applique and embroidery. Vertically symmetrical pattern of flowers and leafy scrolls in blue, pink, yellow, green, cream and metallic gold on a raspberry red velvet ground.
name: Textile
